attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ronnie Biggs is held in a high security prison.He has recently had a heart attack,two strokes,  speaks or communicates with great difficulty.spends 23 hours a day in his cell.I understand he also has a tube inserted in his stomach to feed him as he is unable to feed himself.I ask you Mr Blair,what danger to society is he??.Their are people convicted of sexual crimes who get smaller sentances-USE YOUR COMMON SENSE FOR A CHANGE
